about: Wow, Congrats! You found our test page!

name: Gwaja Fight
about: Gwaja Fight ('Gwaja' means 'chips' in Korean) centers siblings fighting over food. As mom brings home a bag of snacks, the objective is to grab as many as possible when she isn't looking while also stealing your siblings' chips.

name: The Good Fridge
about: The Good Fridge is your personal guide to all your food ethical dilemmas. Which coffee brand follows Fair Trade principles? Which foods has the least environmental impact? The Good Fridge has the answers.

name: Marketing is Fun!
about: Interested in learning marketing and company branding? We will create a mock-up company and focus on developing its brand & full marketing campaign. Based on our research and focus, we will design the companyâ€™s brand, messaging, and advertisements. It will be fun :D

name: spotify.random
about: Many of us are constantly browsing through Spotify's radio or discover weekly to find new music. With Spotify.random, we're aiming to create an app that will generate songs after the user inputs specific settings of how they like a song.

name: Alone Together
about: An interactive digital experience using illustration/3D models and user generated content that addresses isolation in this time but highlights the inherent togetherness. (Run by CL Alums)

name: Charipay: Project Valor
about: Charipay, is a convenience-focused donation platform that connects users to causes and charities. Given the current COVID-19 pandemic, we have decided to create a new web/mobile app solely for providing medical equipment to hospitals in need.
